title: Method Overloading - Add & Greet
description: Master method overloading by creating two pairs of overloaded methods that handle different data types. Learn how Java selects the correct method based on parameter types.
learningObjectives: Understand method overloading and when to use it
Create multiple methods with the same name but different parameter types
Create multiple methods with the same name but different parameter counts
Understand how Java determines which method to call
Implement overloading for practical methods (add, greet)
Return different types from overloaded methods
Apply overloading to improve code readability
